name: Freedom Frogs
description:
(Minor Update v1.1: Checkpoints added at each music note)

Once upon a time, there was a magical forest with singing frogs. *Carefully* you step into the forest when--.. *crunch* 

You brutally murdered a hoard of innocent singing frogs. The forest's protector, the mushroom witch, shows up and is FURIOUS. HOW? HOW COULD YOU DO THIS?

I'M TURNING YOU INTO A FROG UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE! YOU MUST COLLECT ALL PARTS TO FINISH A SONG WHILE ENDURING ALL THE FROG'S OBSTACLES!

hop you have a ribbiting experience!..🐸

... >:)

**This game was made as a submission for the College Game Jam! **

All assets presented in this game (art, writing, music, code, graphics) were made 100% during the week of March 29, 2021 to April 5, 2021.

Thank you for hosting!!*^▽^*

(watch this for awkward intro/dev/gameplay video :3)

BIG THANK YOU to ikeepittaco for recording an entertaining demonstration for us, we love it ^^

Credits:

🎨Jeonyoa- Character sprites, Concept & UI art (Twitter, Instagram)

🔬Jimbo- Programming

🔬Luckism- the GLUE & Programming (Twitter)

🎵mirageofher- Audio & Music (Soundcloud, Twitter)

🎨Tofu- UI Art & Level Design

Controls:

Move: Keyboard <- ->, or A D

Jump: automatic

that's it uh.. toadally easy right? 🤣

~copy of in-game mechanics!~
